name: Wood Puzzle: Fill Wooden Block
description:
Wood Puzzle is an addictive jigsaw puzzle game.

Train your brain at the 10x10 board, place the blocks to create vertical or horizontal line, it will crush and free space for new blocks.

Why choose this Block Puzzle?
• Classic and Bomb game mode
• Leaderboard support
• Fun and Classic brick game
• Free retro quadris puzzle for all age

How to play wood block puzzle？
• Tap to move block.
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Create vertical or horizontal line to make block crush.
• Game will be over if there are no more space for any the given blocks.

Quickly , let's enjoy this addictive puzzle game.
